p: The free radical scavenging activity of the essential oil of T. bovei was tested by DPPH method using Trolox as a reference standard. The concentrations used ranged from 1–100 μg/ml for the essential oil as well as for Trolox. The results are shown in Table 3 that revealed that an excellent antioxidant activity was exhibited by T. bovei essential oil at IC 50 ± SD of 3.41 ± 0.44 μg/ml, which was comparable to Trolox standard that showed IC 50 ± SD of 3.25 ± 0.32 μg/ml, this means that the free radical scavenging activity for T. bovei essential oil was 95.30 % ± 1.3 of the activity of Trolox standard.
